desc: This course offers an in-depth study of the music literature of the 20th and 21st centuries (ca. 1890-present). Prerequisite: Music 241, 242. Offered in alternate years.
name: Music of 20th/21st Cent
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 241, 242. Offered in alternate years.
title: Music of the 20th Century and 21st Century
